main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in Phoenix, Arizona during May 1952.
interesting points: A sighting on May 7 involved 11 local businessmen observing a round, silver object at approximately 15,000 feet,The object was reported to hover and make rapid direction changes without any visible means of propulsion,Another report indicated a sighting at 0400 HST with an estimated length of observation of 2 seconds,Descriptions of the objects included features such as climbing at a 10 degree angle and being circular and white,The document contains references to possible explanations such as balloon or aircraft.
